## Generator\_2.allNestedComments() method

Recursively spider a tree of blocks, returning all their comments.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
allNestedComments(block: Block): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  block | [Block](./blockly.block.md) | The block from which to start spidering.  Concatenated list of comments. |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
